Text:

Thank you CHD242522, this is a fantastic upload at such a quality I haven't seen on the web until now. Much kudos. Thanks again.

  ==TVK==

The original torrents are available at forums[dot]mvgroup[dot]org.

Collecting the torrents together seems like a good idea but it dilutes the seeding and will eventually slow down the download. A better idea is to just collect the torrent files together and create a grand-daddy torrent rather than the huge MKV files.

Then people will run the grand-daddy torrent and create the sub torrent files. Hopefully people would then import the sub-torrent files to join with the original torrents.

hey

can someone make this smaller?
i dont care if its in 1 file or not, but spreading information must be more important than spreading pixels!
